label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: Laboratory Technician - Quality Control

Dear Partners,

PharmaCore Solutions is seeking two Quality Control Laboratory Technicians for our manufacturing plant in Ohio. This is strictly a night shift role (10 PM to 6 AM).

Candidates must have a Bachelorâ€™s degree in Chemistry or Biology. The primary responsibility is testing raw materials and finished products using HPLC and GC instrumentation to ensure compliance with FDA regulations. Attention to detail is critical; a single documentation error can shut down a production line.

We find that people who prefer working independently do well in this shift. Please clarify the night shift requirement with candidates before sending them through, as we have had dropouts in the past due to the hours.

Regards,

Walter Whitefield Lab Manager PharmaCore Solutions

label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: Nurse Practitioner Recruitment - Community Health

Good Morning,

I am writing on behalf of Green Valley Health Clinics. We are opening a new satellite clinic in the northern district and are in need of two Family Nurse Practitioners. Our mission is to provide affordable care to underserved communities, so we need providers who are mission-driven and compassionate.

Candidates must be licensed in the state and have at least 3 years of clinical experience, preferably in a primary care or urgent care setting. They will be responsible for diagnosing and treating common acute and chronic illnesses, prescribing medications, and educating patients on preventative care. Fluency in Spanish is a highly desired skill for this patient demographic.

We offer a competitive salary and full benefits, but the real draw is the work-life balance and the supportive team environment. We operate Monday through Friday, 9 to 5, with no on-call requirements. Please send over profiles of candidates who have expressed an interest in community health.

Warmly,

Rebecca Solis Clinical Director Green Valley Health Clinics

label: new_requisition
text:
Mechanical Engineer - Product Development TeamGreetings,We have an opening on our product development team for a mechanical engineer. Precision Instruments Inc designs and manufactures scientific measurement equipment and we're developing a new product line requiring additional engineering support.The engineer will be involved in all phases of product development including concept design, CAD modeling, prototyping, testing, and working with manufacturing to ensure designs are production-ready. Strong understanding of materials, mechanics, thermodynamics, and manufacturing processes is essential.Required: bachelor's degree in mechanical engineering, 4-6 years of relevant experience, proficiency in SolidWorks or similar CAD software, and experience bringing products from concept to market. Knowledge of GD&T and DFM principles is important.The position is on-site at our facility in San Jose, California. Standard Monday through Friday schedule with occasional overtime during critical project phases. Salary range of 80K to 98K commensurate with experience.Please provide resumes of qualified engineers. We'll review submissions on a rolling basis and schedule interviews accordingly. Target start date is flexible but ideally within two months.Respectfully,
James Wolcott
Engineering Manager
Precision Instruments Inc

label: interview_scheduling
text:
Final Round Interview Confirmation - Marketing Director
Dear Mr. Malhotra,
Congratulations on successfully clearing all previous rounds of interviews!
We are pleased to invite you to the final round for the Marketing Director position at Summit Consumer Brands.
Interview Details:
Date: Thursday, December 19, 2024
Time: 10:00 AM - 1:00 PM (includes lunch)
Venue: Summit Consumer Brands Head Office
5th Floor, Peninsula Corporate Park
Lower Parel, Mumbai - 400013
Interview Schedule:
10:00 AM - 11:00 AM: Presentation to Senior Leadership
11:00 AM - 12:00 PM: One-on-one with CEO (Mr. Ashok Mehta)
12:00 PM - 1:00 PM: Lunch with Executive Team
Presentation Requirements:
Please prepare a 20-minute presentation on:
"Marketing Strategy for Expanding Summit's Presence in Tier 2 & 3 Cities"
Include:

Market analysis
Channel strategy
Budget allocation recommendations
12-month roadmap
Expected ROI

A projector and screen will be available. Please bring your presentation on a laptop or USB drive. We use Windows systems with PowerPoint 2019.
Executive Panel:

Mr. Ashok Mehta, CEO
Ms. Rekha Sharma, COO
Mr. Vikram Singh, CMO
Ms. Anita Desai, CFO

Items to bring:

Presentation materials (laptop/USB + handouts for 5 people)
Updated CV (5 copies)
Original educational and professional certificates
Three professional references (contact details)
Valid photo ID

Parking & Arrival:
Covered parking available in basement levels B1-B3 (bring this email for free validation). Please arrive by 9:45 AM to complete visitor formalities at ground floor reception. Ask for Mr. Ashok Mehta's office.
Dress Code: Business formals (jacket required for presentation)
Reimbursement:
We will reimburse your travel costs. Please keep all receipts (flight/train tickets, cab receipts). Submit to HR within 7 days of interview.
Lunch:
We'll have lunch at our office cafeteria with some of our leadership team. It's a great opportunity to understand our culture better. Please inform us of any dietary restrictions.
This is the final stage of our selection process. If successful, we typically extend offers within 3-5 business days.
Please confirm your attendance by 6 PM on Monday, December 16th.
For any clarifications or emergencies, please feel free to call me directly.
We wish you the very best!
Warm Regards,
Ravi Patel
VP - Human Resources
Summit Consumer Brands Ltd
ravi.patel@summitbrands.in
Direct Line: +91-22-6677-8899
Mobile: +91-98200-11223

label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: Immediate assistance needed: Head of Engineering search

Hi Sarah,

I hope you are having a good week.

I am reaching out because we have hit a critical growth phase at Nexus FinTech and our current technical leadership structure is struggling to keep pace with the product roadmap. We need to bring in a VP of Engineering or Head of Engineering to professionalize our development processes.

We are looking for someone with at least 12 years of experience in software development, with the last 5 years specifically in a leadership role managing teams of over 40 engineers. They need to be heavy on the people management side but still technically literate enough to challenge our architects. Experience with Python, AWS, and high-frequency trading platforms is non-negotiable.

Culturally, we need a steady hand. Someone who can mentor junior devs and calm the chaos, not add to it. We are aiming for a base salary between 200k and 250k plus significant equity.

Please send over a shortlist of 3 to 5 strong profiles by next Wednesday. We need to close this before Q3 begins.

Best regards,
David Chen Co-Founder & COO Nexus FinTech

Subject: Executive Search: Chief Financial Officer for Sterling Assets

We are initiating a confidential search for a Chief Financial Officer to lead Sterling Assets into our next phase of growth. As we prepare for our upcoming IPO, we require a seasoned executive with significant experience in public markets and regulatory compliance.

Subject: Construction project manager needed urgently
Good afternoon,
My name is Vincent Dupuis and I am the Regional Manager for Redwood Construction Ltd. We are a mid-sized construction firm specializing in commercial buildings and infrastructure projects, operating primarily in the Greater Vancouver area with a workforce of approximately 290 people.
We have just won the contract for a significant office development in Burnaby and require an experienced Construction Project Manager to oversee the build from start to finish. The project is scheduled to break ground in late January so we are working against a very tight deadline here.
The candidate must have their Gold Seal certification, at least 8 years of experience managing commercial construction projects valued at $20M+, and strong relationships with local trades and suppliers. They will be managing a site team of roughly 40 people at peak construction phase.
I attempted to fill this role through internal promotion but unfortunately none of our current Project Coordinators are quite ready for this level of responsibility yet. We need someone who has done this before and won't need their hand held.

label: new_requisition
text:
Personal Trainer - High-End Fitness Studio
Hello!
We're opening a new boutique fitness studio in Manhattan and need to hire two personal trainers for our launch team.
The vibe here is upscale, personalized fitness for busy professionals. We're looking for trainers with at least 3 years of experience, current personal training certification from a reputable organization like NASM or ACE, and expertise in strength training, functional fitness, and corrective exercise. Nutrition coaching knowledge is a huge bonus.
More than technical skills, we need trainers who are personable, professional, motivating, and can build strong relationships with clients. Our members are paying premium prices and expect premium service.
Compensation is 55K to 70K base plus commission on personal training sessions and class instruction. There's real earning potential here for trainers who build a strong client base.
We're opening in late February so need to have our training team in place by early February for pre-opening prep and marketing.
Can you send us some strong candidates? Please include anyone who has experience in boutique fitness or high-end gyms.
Thanks!
Tyler Kim
Co-owner
Elevate Fitness Studio

label: new_requisition
text:
Immediate Opening: Sous Chef at The Grafton Hotel
To Whom It May Concern,
Please be advised that The Grafton Hotel has an immediate opening for a Sous Chef, following the unexpected resignation of our previous employee.
The position demands a minimum of five years experience in a high-volume, fine-dining kitchen. Candidates must have expertise in modern European cuisine, banquet service for up to 300, and inventory management. A culinary diploma is preferred. Key skills include butchery, sauce work, and the ability to manage a line of 8 cooks.
The role requires a disciplined, calm-under-pressure professional with impeccable hygiene standards. This is a salaried, on-site position with a benefits package. The start date is urgent, within two weeks if possible.
Please submit candidates for my review. I will require references from their last two Head Chefs.
Yours faithfully,
Anton MÃ¼ller
Executive Chef, The Grafton Hotel

Good morning,

I hope this email finds you well.

My name is Megan Clarke, and I am the HR Manager at BluePeak Technologies. We are currently looking to expand our team and have an opening for a HR Business Partner located in Toronto (Local Only).

We are looking for a mid-senior professional with 7â€“10 years of experience in organizational development.

Key Requirements:

    Strong background in ISO Compliance and labor laws.

    Proficiency with HubSpot CRM or similar people management tools.

    Experience in Public Speaking and internal training is a definite plus.

Offer Details:

    Salary: $50kâ€“70k (depending on experience).

    Timeline: We are looking to fill this role within the next 30 Days.

Could you please share a few profiles that match this description? We would appreciate resumes and references attached.

Warm regards,

Megan Clarke HR Manager BluePeak Technologies

Subject: Urgent Requirement: Senior Backend Engineer needed ASAP

Hi Sarah,

I hope you are having a good week. We find ourselves in a bit of a bind and need your team's assistance immediately. We just landed the GreenScale contract, which is fantastic news, but it means our current backend infrastructure needs a massive overhaul much faster than we anticipated.

We need a Senior Backend Engineer who specializes in Python and Django. This person must have at least 6 years of experience handling high-traffic databases and API integrations. If they have exposure to AWS Lambda, that is a huge bonus. The cultural fit is crucial here; we need someone who can work under pressure without losing their cool, as the next three months will be intense.

We are looking at a salary range of 120k to 140k depending on experience. Please send over the top three profiles you have by Wednesday. We are ready to interview on Thursday and hire by Friday.

Thanks for moving quickly on this.

Best,
Marcus Thorne CTO Apex Logic Solutions

Subject: Collaboration inquiry - Technical writer position
Guten Tag Mr. Fischer,
I am reaching out from Precision Instruments GmbH, a manufacturer of laboratory equipment and measurement devices located in Munich. We employ approximately 580 people across manufacturing, R&D, sales, and administration.
We are searching for a Technical Writer with strong English language skills to join our documentation team. This person will be responsible for creating user manuals, technical specifications, and regulatory documentation for our products which are exported globally. Experience with medical device documentation would be highly valued as we are expanding into that sector.
This is a permanent position based in our Munich office, though one or two days of remote work per week may be negotiated. The salary package is competitive and includes our standard benefits program.
I would like to understand how Summit Talent Partners typically manages searches of this nature, particularly regarding candidate assessment of technical writing abilities. Perhaps we could arrange a video call via Zoom or Teams next week?
I look forward to your response.

label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: Quality Assurance Tester - Software Company
Good afternoon,
Our software development team is growing and we need to add a quality assurance tester to ensure we're delivering reliable, bug-free products to our customers.
The QA tester will create and execute test plans, identify and document bugs, verify fixes, perform regression testing, collaborate with developers throughout the development cycle, and contribute to improving our overall testing processes.
We're looking for someone with 2-4 years of QA testing experience, preferably in software or web applications. Should be familiar with both manual and automated testing, have experience with testing tools and bug tracking systems, understand software development lifecycles, and have a meticulous attention to detail.
Strong analytical skills and clear communication are important since they'll be working closely with our development team. Experience with agile methodologies would be beneficial.
This is a full-time remote position - we're fully distributed as a company. Salary range is 60K to 72K.
We're hoping to bring someone on within 4-6 weeks. Send over qualified candidates and we'll set up interviews.
Best,
Carlos Medina
Product Manager
Streamware Technologies

text:

Hi,
We just won a huge contract and need to scale up our development team immediately. Looking for three solid Java developers to work on enterprise applications for our clients.
Mid-level developers with 4-6 years of experience in Java, Spring Framework, RESTful APIs, SQL databases. Experience with microservices architecture and cloud platforms like Azure would be a big plus. They need to be able to work independently, write clean code, and collaborate with the team.

Send me resumes ASAP and we'll do phone screens right away.

Priya Shankar

label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: Looking for a Social Media Manager
Hi there!
We're a small tourism company specializing in adventure travel experiences and we've realized we really need professional help with our social media. It's been kind of all over the place and we know it could be so much better.
We need someone to develop our social media strategy, create and schedule content across Instagram, Facebook, and TikTok, engage with our community, run some paid campaigns, and track what's actually working. Most importantly, capture the excitement and beauty of the destinations and experiences we offer.
Ideal candidate has 2-4 years of social media management experience, strong photography and video skills, copywriting ability, and genuinely loves travel and adventure. If they've worked in tourism or hospitality, even better.
This can be remote and honestly we're flexible on the structure - could be full-time at 50K to 60K or we'd consider a contractor arrangement. Just need someone talented and reliable.
We're not in a huge rush but would love to get someone going by February so we can really ramp up before peak travel season.
Let me know what you think!
Cheers,
Olivia Chen
Co-founder
Wild Horizons Travel

School Counselor Opening - Start Date August 2026Dear Hiring Partner,Riverside Academy, a private K-8 school in Austin, Texas, is seeking a school counselor for the upcoming 2026-2027 academic year. While this is well in advance, we believe in thorough hiring processes for positions that significantly impact our students.The counselor will provide individual and group counseling, support students with academic and social-emotional needs, collaborate with teachers and parents, coordinate with external mental health providers when necessary, and develop school-wide programs promoting wellbeing and character development.Requirements include a master's degree in school counseling or related field, state licensure or certification, and preferably 3-5 years of experience working with elementary and middle school students. We value empathy, cultural competency, strong communication skills, and alignment with our school's values of community, curiosity, and compassion.This is a full-time position with a competitive salary based on experience, typically ranging from 55K to 68K, plus benefits including health insurance, retirement contributions, and generous time off aligned with the school calendar.We would appreciate receiving candidate profiles by the end of February. Dr. Michelle Rosario
Head of School
Riverside Academy

text:
Subject: Seeking Registered Nurse for Assisted Living Facility
Dear Recruitment Agency,
Sunrise Gardens Assisted Living is seeking a compassionate and qualified Registered Nurse to join our care team in Fort Worth, Texas. We provide residence and care for 68 seniors in a warm, family-oriented environment.
The RN will be responsible for medication administration, care plan development, coordination with physicians and families, supervision of CNAs, and ensuring compliance with all state healthcare regulations. We operate on a rotating schedule with day, evening, and occasional night shifts.
Essential qualifications:

Current Texas RN license in good standing
Minimum 2 years nursing experience, geriatric care preferred
Strong assessment and critical thinking skills
Excellent communication with elderly patients and their families
CPR and First Aid certification

We pride ourselves on our caring culture and low staff turnover. This is a stable, rewarding position for a nurse who truly enjoys working with seniors.
Compensation is $62k-$70k annually with shift differentials, plus health insurance, paid time off, and continuing education allowances.
Please forward qualified candidates who are available for a working interview, which allows them to spend a day with our team and residents to ensure mutual fit.
Thank you for your assistance,
Margaret Sullivan
Administrator
Sunrise Gardens Assisted Living

label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: New Role: Content Writer (Finance)

Hello,

We are looking for a specialized Content Writer for our financial advisory firm. We are trying to build up our blog and authority in the market, so we need high-quality articles.

This is not a fluff writing job. We need someone who understands the stock market, investment strategies, and retirement planning. They need to be able to take complex financial topics and write about them in a way that our average client can understand, without dumbing it down too much.

Ideally, we want someone with a background in journalism or finance. 3+ years of experience writing for fintech or banking is required. This is a remote role, but we expect them to join our weekly editorial meetings. Please ask for writing samples that demonstrate technical financial knowledge.

Regards,

Simon Trent CMO WealthFront Advisors

label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: Requirement for Clinical Research Coordinator

Dear Recruitment Team,

BioVance Pharmaceuticals is launching a Phase III trial for our new immunology drug, and we require a Clinical Research Coordinator to manage the patient data and regulatory documentation. This is a critical role for the success of the trial.

The candidate must have a background in life sciences or nursing and at least 3 years of experience in clinical trials. Familiarity with GCP guidelines and FDA regulations is non-negotiable. Attention to detail is paramount in this role.

We are looking for someone who is organized, ethical, and patient-focused. The position is based at our Boston facility. Please vet candidates thoroughly for their regulatory knowledge before sending them our way.

Regards,

Dr. Emily Thorne Head of Clinical Operations BioVance Pharmaceuticals

label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: Software Engineering Manager - Fintech
Dear Partner,
We are a Series B fintech startup experiencing rapid growth and need to hire an Engineering Manager to lead our payments team. This is a critical hire for us as we scale our engineering organization.
The role requires:

8+ years software engineering experience with at least 2 years in management
Deep technical knowledge of backend systems, APIs, and databases
Experience in fintech or payments industry strongly preferred
Proven ability to recruit, mentor, and retain engineering talent
Strong communication skills and ability to collaborate cross-functionally

Responsibilities include managing a team of 6-8 engineers, contributing to technical architecture decisions, driving sprint planning and delivery, and fostering a culture of excellence and innovation.
We offer a competitive package: $165k-$195k base, equity, unlimited PTO, full health benefits, and a $2k annual learning stipend. We are remote-first with optional office space in San Francisco.
Timeline: We would like to have someone in place by mid-February. Please share profiles of candidates who meet the experience requirements and can provide leadership references.
Looking forward to collaborating with you.
Best regards,
Simone Adebayo
VP of Engineering
PayStream Technologies

label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: FIFO Sparkies needed for Pilbara project

From: Dave 'Macca' Mackenzie, Site Supervisor at Red Earth Civil To: Kelly O'Brien, Account Manager at WestCoast Trades

G'day Kelly,

How are things over there?

Look, we have just won the tender for the expansion up at the Iron Valley site. It is a big win for us but it means I am short on manpower. I am going to need about 10 A-grade electricians and maybe 4 trade assistants ready to fly out by the 20th of next month.

It is a standard 2-and-1 roster. Rates are the usual but we are throwing in a completion bonus to stop guys jumping ship halfway through.

Can you check your books and see who is available? I need blokes who are actually ticketed and pass the drug test on the first go. Last batch from the other agency was a bit rough.

Give me a ring on the mobile if you need specifics.

Cheers,

Macca Red Earth Civil Perth, WA

label: new_requisition
text:
URGENT: Replacement for Lead Phlebotomist

To the Recruitment Team,

I am writing this with extreme urgency. Our Lead Phlebotomist at Westside Community Clinic walked out this morning without notice, and we are absolutely swamped with patient appointments. I need you to find me a temporary-to-permanent replacement immediately.

The candidate must have a valid state phlebotomy license and at least 3 years of experience in a high-volume clinic. They need to be able to hit the ground running with zero training. Key skills are pediatric draws and difficult veins. Soft skills are crucial here; they need to have excellent bedside manner because our patients are already frustrated with the wait times.

We can offer a premium hourly rate due to the short notice. Please do not send me anyone who requires a two-week notice period at their current job; I need someone who can start tomorrow or Monday at the latest.

Send me resumes as soon as they hit your inbox. Do not wait to batch them.

Thanks,

Martha Higgins Practice Manager Westside Community Clinic

text:
New Marketing Role at Verde
Hello,
Verde, an established lifestyle brand in the gardening space, is creating a new role: Community & Social Media Manager.
This is a mid-level position for someone with 3-5 years of experience building engaged online communities, ideally around a hobby or passion. They will be responsible for our Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube presence, creating both educational and inspirational content. Skills in content planning, analytics, and influencer outreach are key.
We value authenticity and a genuine green thumb. The person should be warm, encouraging, and able to translate complex gardening topics into simple, beautiful content. This is a hybrid role at our Portland headquarters.
We are hiring to deepen our connection with our core audience. We'd like to see candidates' portfolios and social media handles. Aim to have first interviews scheduled in the next two weeks.
Warmly,
Chloe Benton
Head of Marketing, Verde

Subject: Partnership opportunity - Healthcare recruitment
Good morning,
My name is Dr. Elise Moreau and I serve as the Director of Human Resources at Maplewood Health Services, a network of four primary care clinics across Ontario with a total staff of approximately 310 individuals including physicians, nurses, and administrative personnel.
We are currently seeking to fill several clinical positions including 2 Registered Nurses, 1 Nurse Practitioner, and 3 Medical Office Assistants. These vacancies have arisen due to a combination of retirement and expansion into our new Mississauga location which opens in March.
I understand that Northpoint Recruiting has considerable experience in healthcare placements and came highly recommended by a colleague at Sunnybrook. We value professionalism and thoroughness in our recruitment process as cultural fit is absolutely essential in a patient-facing environment.
Would you be available for a brief conversation via Teams sometime this week? I am generally free on Wednesday and Thursday mornings before 11am.
Thank you for your consideration.
Warm regards,
Dr. Elise Moreau
Director of Human Resources
Maplewood Health Services
e.moreau@maplewoodhealth.ca

text:
Subject: Marketing Manager Search

Hi there,

We are looking for a generalist Marketing Manager to join our team at EcoWare. We sell sustainable kitchen products and we are growing steadily. Up until now, I have been doing the marketing myself, but it is becoming too much to manage alongside product development.

I need a jack-of-all-trades. Someone who can manage our Instagram, write email newsletters, set up basic Google Ads, and coordinate with influencers. They do not need to be an expert in everything, but they need to be willing to learn and execute. 3 to 5 years of experience in e-commerce marketing is ideal.

The vibe here is very relaxed. We work from a co-working space and usually do lunch together on Fridays. I need someone who is passionate about sustainability and the environment. If they use plastic water bottles, they probably will not fit in! Let's aim to have someone start within the month.

Cheers,

Tom Barker Founder EcoWare

text:
Technical Assessment + Interview - Software QA Engineer
Good evening Vinay,

Thank you for your application to the Software QA Engineer position at TestPro Solutions.

We would like to invite you for a combined technical assessment and interview session.

**Session Details:**

Date: Tuesday, 17th December 2024
Time: 2:00 PM - 5:00 PM IST (3-hour session)
Format: Google Meet (link below)

**Session Breakdown:**
- 2:00 PM - 3:30 PM: Written technical assessment (test case design, bug reporting, SQL queries)
- 3:30 PM - 3:45 PM: Break
- 3:45 PM - 5:00 PM: Technical interview with QA Lead

**Google Meet Link:** meet.google.com/tpq-wxyz-abc
**Meeting ID:** 123-456-789

**Requirements:**
- Stable internet connection
- Quiet environment
- Webcam must be on throughout the session
- Have a text editor ready for writing test scenarios
- Basic SQL environment (you can use online SQL editors)

The assessment will be shared via screen sharing. You'll have access to search engines and documentation as you would in a real work environment.

**Topics Covered:**
- Manual testing concepts
- Automation frameworks (Selenium, Appium)
- API testing (Postman, REST APIs)
- Defect lifecycle and reporting

Please confirm your availability by replying to this email before EOD Friday, Dec 13th.

Note: This is a 3-hour commitment, so please ensure you have blocked your calendar accordingly.

Should you have any questions or technical concerns, feel free to reach out.

Regards,

Pallavi Menon
QA Recruitment Lead
TestPro Solutions Pvt Ltd
pallavi.menon@testpro.in
Contact: +91-97412-88765

label: new_requisition
text:
Detailed Brief for Cloud Security Architect Role
Dear Recruitment Specialists,
I am Sameer D. Khurana, Chief Information Security Officer at Silverline Infoworks. As part of our infrastructure modernization, we are hiring a Cloud Security Architect. This is a highly technical and strategic position requiring 8 to 12 years of experience with cloud security frameworks, IAM models, network segmentation, and threat modeling.
Responsibilities include designing end to end security controls across AWS workloads, reviewing architectural diagrams, leading incident response drills, implementing zero trust patterns, and collaborating with DevOps teams. Required skills include Terraform, Kubernetes security, encryption standards, SIEM tuning, and regulatory compliance knowledge.
The role is hybrid in Bangalore with compensation around industry median for this level.
Please send only deeply evaluated candidates who have handled large scale cloud deployments. We expect the first batch of profiles within 10 days.

We need CPAs with at least 5 years of public accounting experience. They must be experts in corporate tax returns and familiar with QuickBooks and Lacerte software. The job involves preparing and reviewing returns for our SME clients.

Attention to detail is paramount. We cannot afford errors. The hours will be long during March and April, so please ensure candidates are aware of the overtime requirements.

Regards,

Ben Wyatt Partner Precision Tax Services

label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: Hiring: Junior Paralegal - Litigation Team

Good morning,

We are looking to expand our litigation department at Halloway & Oates due to an influx of class-action lawsuits. We require a Junior Paralegal to support our senior partners.

The candidate should have a bachelor's degree and a paralegal certificate. We are willing to look at fresh graduates, but 1-2 years of experience in a law firm would be preferable. Their primary duties will include legal research, drafting motions, organizing case files, and managing the discovery process.

Attention to detail is the single most important trait. One typo can be disastrous in our line of work. We need someone highly organized, punctual, and capable of handling high-pressure deadlines without cracking. Professional dress and demeanor are required at all times as they will occasionally interact with high-profile clients.

Please forward resumes of candidates who have a GPA of 3.5 or higher. We need to fill this seat by the first of next month.

Sincerely,

Katherine Pierce Human Resources Director Halloway & Oates, LLP

Subject: Senior Accountant Position - Manufacturing Sector
Good afternoon,
I am writing to request your assistance in filling a Senior Accountant position within our organization. We are a mid-sized manufacturing company producing automotive parts, with facilities in Detroit and a workforce of approximately 200 employees.
The successful candidate will be responsible for:

Month-end and year-end closing procedures
Cost accounting and variance analysis
Preparation of financial statements and management reports

Supervision of two junior accountants

Bachelor degree in Accounting or Finance
CPA certification strongly preferred

Subject: Quick question re: recruitment services
Hi there,
Lauren here from Tidemark Publishing. We're a small independent publisher in Portland, around 30 people, mostly doing regional interest books and some educational materials.
So here's the situation â€“ our Marketing Director just told us she's pregnant and will be going on maternity leave starting in April. Congrats to her obviously, but it leaves us in a bit of a bind because we've got our biggest book launch of the year happening in May and we absolutely cannot drop the ball on publicity.
We need someone who can step in on a contract basis, maybe 6-8 months, who actually understands book marketing and isn't going to suggest we go viral on TikTok or whatever. Someone with traditional media contacts, experience organizing author events, that kind of thing.
I found your agency through a Google search and your website looked reasonably credible. What's your process like and how quickly could you turn around some candidates? Also what do you charge for contract placements?
Sorry for the somewhat chaotic email â€“ it's been one of those weeks!
Lauren Moss
Operations Manager
Tidemark Publishing

Subject: Search Mandate: Chief Marketing Officer

To the Talent Acquisition Partners,

We are initiating a confidential search for a new Chief Marketing Officer for Nebulon Tech. Our current growth trajectory requires a leader who has taken a SaaS company from Series B to IPO. This is a critical hire for our long-term strategy.

The candidate must demonstrate a proven track record in global brand positioning and demand generation. We are not looking for a maintenance manager; we need a builder. Compensation involves a competitive base plus significant equity options. Please exercise discretion when reaching out to potential candidates, as this role has not been announced internally yet. We expect a shortlist of high-caliber profiles within 14 days.

Regards,

Jonathan Grieves Founder & CEO Nebulon Tech

label: new_requisition
text:
Registered Nurse - Pediatric Unit
Good morning,
City General Hospital has multiple openings for registered nurses in our pediatric unit due to departmental expansion. We are a 300-bed hospital serving the greater Minneapolis community.
Seeking RNs with current Minnesota licensure, BLS and PALS certification, and minimum 1 year of pediatric nursing experience preferred though new graduates with pediatric clinical rotations will be considered. Responsibilities include patient assessment, medication administration, collaboration with physicians and families, patient education, and maintaining accurate medical records.
We need compassionate nurses who work well in a fast-paced environment and demonstrate excellent clinical judgment. Bilingual candidates (particularly Spanish or Somali) are especially encouraged to apply given our diverse patient population.
These are full-time positions with rotating shifts including days, nights, and weekends. Competitive salary based on experience starting at 68K with shift differentials, plus comprehensive benefits including tuition reimbursement for continuing education.
We're conducting interviews on an ongoing basis and can move quickly for qualified candidates. Please submit resumes and we'll coordinate interviews with our nurse manager.
Thank you,
Lisa Yamamoto
Nurse Recruiter
City General Hospital

text:
Subject: Re: Job Requisition - Plant Manager - Dayton Facility

Dear Hiring Partners,

Please accept this email as a formal request to open a search for a Plant Manager at our Dayton manufacturing facility. As you know, we are expanding our production line to accommodate the new automotive contracts, and our current leadership structure needs reinforcement.

The ideal candidate will possess a minimum of 10 years of experience in lean manufacturing, preferably within the automotive sector. They must hold a Six Sigma Black Belt certification. Responsibilities include overseeing daily floor operations, managing a team of 150 unionized workers, and ensuring strict adherence to OSHA safety regulations. We are looking for a leader who is firm but fair and understands the intricacies of supply chain logistics.

This is an onsite role with a standard Monday through Friday schedule, though some weekend shifts may be required during Q3. We are looking to have this position filled by the start of next month to align with our fiscal quarter planning. Please screen for candidates who have experience managing budgets exceeding 5 million dollars.

Sincerely,

Margaret O'Neil VP of Operations SteelCore Industries

Portfolio Recruitment,
Please find the detailed requirement for an Embedded Systems Architect for our client, AeroVantage.
The role demands a minimum of ten years of experience in designing safety-critical embedded systems, preferably in aerospace or automotive. Expertise in C/C++, RTOS, and communication protocols like CAN and ARINC 429 is required. Experience with DO-178C standards is a significant advantage.
The architect will lead a small team designing next-gen flight data systems. The position is on-site in Wichita. Compensation is commensurate with this seniority level. Provide a full technical assessment with each submission.

Position: Senior Accountant
Date: Wednesday, December 18, 2024
Time: 11:30 AM IST
Duration: Approximately 75 minutes
Location: FinanceWorks Solutions, 7th Floor, Cybercity, Magarpatta City, Pune - 411013

**Interview Panel:**
- Ms. Sunita Reddy, Finance Manager (45 minutes)
- Mr. Prakash Deshmukh, CFO (30 minutes)

- Advanced accounting procedures (GAAP/IFRS)

There will be a 30-minute practical test involving balance sheet analysis and journal entry review. Calculator and paper will be provided.

Travel reimbursement available for outstation candidates (up to â‚¹2500 with original receipts).

label: new_requisition
text:
Requirement for Quantum Computing Engineer at NeuroTech Labs

Greetings,

NeuroTech Labs is initiating a new project in quantum algorithms and requires a Quantum Computing Engineer to join our research team.

The role demands a PhD in Physics, Computer Science, or a related field, with 3+ years of hands-on experience in quantum circuit design and simulation. Key responsibilities include developing quantum algorithms, optimizing quantum hardware interfaces, and publishing research findings. Essential skills are proficiency in Qiskit or Cirq, knowledge of quantum error correction, and experience with superconducting qubits. The candidate must be innovative and collaborative.

This is a full-time, on-site position in Boston. Compensation includes a generous salary and research grants.

We need this position filled within two months. Please screen for technical expertise through coding assessments and peer reviews. Share detailed resumes and publication lists.

Regards,
Dr. Aris Thorne
Head of Research and Development
NeuroTech Labs

label: new_requisition
text:
VP of Operations - Manufacturing Company
Good afternoon,
I'm writing on behalf of Ironworks Manufacturing, a well-established producer of industrial equipment with annual revenues of approximately 50 million dollars. We are conducting a confidential search for a Vice President of Operations.
This is a senior leadership position reporting to the CEO and overseeing all aspects of our manufacturing operations across two facilities. The VP will be responsible for production planning, quality assurance, supply chain management, continuous improvement initiatives, capital project execution, and leading a team of operations managers and supervisors totaling about 180 employees.
We seek a proven operations leader with 10-15 years of progressive experience in manufacturing management, preferably in industrial or heavy equipment sectors. An engineering degree is preferred and Lean Six Sigma certification would be advantageous. Critical competencies include strategic thinking, P&L responsibility, change management, and strong leadership presence.
This role is based at our headquarters in Grand Rapids, Michigan. Compensation package includes base salary in the 140K to 170K range, performance bonus potential, equity participation, and comprehensive executive benefits.
Given the confidential nature of this search, please send only highly qualified candidates who meet the stated criteria. We would like to begin interviews in three weeks and aim to have someone in place by March.
I'm available to discuss the opportunity in more detail at your convenience.
Sincerely,
Robert Mackenzie
Chief Executive Officer
Ironworks Manufacturing

Executive Search: Chief Technology Officer
Dear Partners at Verity Search,
Atherton Dynamics is embarking on a transformative phase, shifting from hardware-centric to a software-defined architecture for our next-generation industrial drones. Consequently, we are initiating a confidential search for a Chief Technology Officer.
The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of leading engineering teams (50+) in embedded systems and IoT platforms, preferably within robotics or avionics. An advanced degree in Computer Engineering is required. Key responsibilities will include setting the technical vision, managing a $15M+ R&D budget, and fostering partnerships with academic institutions.
We seek a strategic thinker with exceptional stakeholder management skills. Compensation includes a competitive base, significant equity, and comprehensive benefits. The role is hybrid, based in Seattle.
We expect a thorough vetting process, including technical leadership assessments. Please coordinate with my EA to schedule a briefing.
Sincerely,
Eleanor Vance
Chief Operating Officer, Atherton Dynamics

label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: Head of Customer Success - SaaS Experience RequiredDear Agency Team,I trust this finds you well. ConnectHub is at an exciting inflection point and we need to build out our customer success function properly.About us: We're a B2B SaaS company providing collaboration tools for remote teams. We have about 300 enterprise clients and we've been growing 200% year over year. We're at that stage where scrappy startup tactics aren't cutting it anymore and we need professional leadership.Position: Head of Customer Success
Level: Director/VP level depending on candidate strength
Team: Currently 6 customer success managers, will grow to 12-15 under this person
Reporting: This role reports to our Chief Revenue OfficerWhat we need:

8-10 years in customer success, account management, or related field
At least 3-5 years in leadership managing teams of 5+ people
SaaS experience is absolutely required, preferably B2B
Track record of improving retention metrics and reducing churn
Experience with customer success platforms (Gainsight, Totango, ChurnZero)
Strong analytical skills and comfort with data-driven decision making
Excellent presentation and executive communication skills
Responsibilities:

Own all post-sale customer relationships
Develop and implement customer success strategy and processes
Build playbooks for onboarding, adoption, renewal, and expansion
Establish metrics and reporting for the customer success team
Work closely with sales and product teams
Identify upsell and cross-sell opportunities
Handle escalations and executive-level customer relationships
Compensation is 130-150k base plus 20-30% target bonus tied to retention and expansion metrics. Equity grant in the 0.1-0.25% range. We're remote-friendly but prefer someone in the Pacific or Mountain time zones.Ideal start date would be early April. Please send candidate profiles with specific customer success accomplishments and metrics they've improved.Looking forward to your recommendations.Warm regards,
Nathan Goldberg
Chief Revenue Officer
ConnectHub

Subject: Administrative Assistant needed for Real Estate office

Hello,

I hope you are having a good week. I am looking for a sharp, organized Administrative Assistant for our downtown real estate office. The agents are running around crazy and the paperwork is piling up.

They need to be proficient in Microsoft Office and comfortable learning new CRM software.

We need someone with high energy. Real estate is a 24/7 business and the office can get loud and hectic. Previous experience in a real estate office is preferred but not required. We just need someone reliable who shows up on time and keeps us organized.

Best,

Linda Carter Office Manager Prime City Realty

text:
Accountant Position - Growing FirmDear Recruitment Team,Clearview Financial Advisors is seeking to hire a staff accountant to support our growing client base. We are a mid-sized financial advisory firm with offices in Denver and Colorado Springs.The position requires a bachelor's degree in accounting, CPA certification (or actively pursuing), and 2-4 years of experience in public accounting or a related field. Primary responsibilities include preparing financial statements, managing accounts payable and receivable, assisting with audits, and supporting tax preparation during busy season.We value accuracy, professionalism, and strong communication skills. The successful candidate will work closely with our senior accountant and will have opportunities for professional development and advancement.This is a full-time position based in our Denver office with a salary range of 60K to 72K plus benefits. Standard business hours Monday through Friday, with extended hours expected during tax season.Please forward resumes of qualified candidates at your earliest convenience. We would like to conduct interviews over the next three weeks and extend an offer by mid-January.Thank you for your attention to this matter.Best regards,
Sandra Huang
Managing Partner
Clearview Financial Advisors

label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: Detailed Requirements - Senior Business Analyst
Good afternoon,
Meridian Financial Group is implementing a comprehensive digital transformation initiative and we require a Senior Business Analyst to serve as the bridge between our business stakeholders and technical teams.
This is a highly visible role reporting to our Chief Information Officer. The successful candidate will be responsible for gathering and documenting business requirements, creating process flow diagrams, conducting gap analysis, writing user stories for development teams, and facilitating workshops with stakeholders across multiple departments.
Technical requirements:

6-8 years business analysis experience, financial services industry mandatory
Expert-level proficiency with requirements gathering methodologies
Advanced skills in Visio, JIRA, and Confluence
SQL knowledge for data analysis and validation
Familiarity with Agile and Waterfall methodologies
Experience with system integration projects

Soft skills requirements:

Exceptional written and verbal communication
Ability to manage competing priorities and stakeholder expectations
Strategic thinking with attention to detail
Comfortable presenting to executive leadership
Professional demeanor and strong business acumen

The ideal candidate will have experience with core banking systems, loan origination platforms, or wealth management applications. Any certifications such as CBAP or PMI-PBA are advantageous but not required.
This is a permanent, full-time position based in our downtown Minneapolis office with a hybrid schedule of 3 days on-site and 2 days remote after an initial onboarding period. Compensation range is $95k-$115k depending on qualifications, plus annual bonus potential of 10-15%, comprehensive benefits package including 401k match, and professional development budget.
We're seeking candidates who can commence employment within 30-45 days. Please submit detailed resumes highlighting specific projects and outcomes achieved, along with professional references.
We appreciate your partnership in this search.
Sincerely,
Jonathan Hayes
Director of Human Resources
Meridian Financial Group

label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: Senior Accountant - Manufacturing CompanyDear Sir or Madam,Precision Metalworks Inc. is seeking a Senior Accountant to join our finance department in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. Our company manufactures aerospace components and has been in operation for 32 years with annual revenues of approximately $45 million.The successful candidate will be responsible for month-end close procedures, financial reporting, variance analysis, inventory accounting, and assisting with annual audits. This individual will work closely with our Controller and will have one junior accountant as a direct report.Minimum requirements:

Bachelor's degree in Accounting
CPA license required
5-7 years of accounting experience, preferably in manufacturing
Strong knowledge of GAAP
Proficiency with ERP systems, particularly SAP
Advanced Excel skills
This is an on-site position, Monday through Friday, 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM. We offer a competitive salary of $75k-$85k, comprehensive health benefits, 401k matching, and three weeks paid vacation.Please submit resumes of candidates who meet all stated requirements. We prefer candidates who are local to the Milwaukee area or willing to relocate at their own expense.Sincerely,
Robert J. Hammond
Human Resources Manager
Precision Metalworks Inc.

Hello,
Wellington Asset Management is looking to hire two entry-level financial analysts to join our investment research team.

Event Coordinator Position
Hey!
Hope you can help us out. We're a nonprofit that puts on fundraising events throughout the year and we desperately need an event coordinator because our last person moved out of state.
Basically we need someone to plan and execute about 8-10 events per year ranging from small donor receptions to our big annual gala with 500 people. That means venue selection, vendor management, budget tracking, volunteer coordination, day-of logistics, all of it.

They need to be super detail-oriented, able to juggle multiple events at once, good with people, and genuinely care about our mission which is providing educational opportunities for underserved youth.
It's a full-time role based in Nashville. Salary is modest because we're a nonprofit - 45K to 52K - but the work is really meaningful and our team culture is amazing.

label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: Solicitation of Candidates: Senior Compliance Counsel Vacancy

To the Attention of JurisSelect Search Firm,

This correspondence serves as a formal request from Sovereign Global Governance to commence the recruitment process for a Senior Compliance Counsel. As we navigate an increasingly complex regulatory framework, it is imperative that we secure legal counsel of the highest caliber to mitigate institutional risk.

The requisite candidate must possess a Juris Doctor from an accredited law school and maintain active bar membership in good standing. We demand a minimum of 10 years of experience in regulatory law, with specific expertise in FCPA and international trade compliance. The individual will be responsible for auditing internal policies and representing the organization before federal agencies.

We anticipate closing the submission window on the 30th of this month. You are instructed to transmit the curriculum vitae and writing samples of suitable candidates to our legal department for preliminary review. Subsequent to this review, we will issue directives regarding interview protocols.

Respectfully,

Katherine Sterling, Esq. General Counsel Sovereign Global Governance k.sterling@sovereignglobal

label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: Sales Representatives - Medical Device Company
Good morning,
BioMed Solutions is launching a revolutionary cardiac monitoring device and we need four Territory Sales Representatives to drive adoption in hospitals and cardiology practices across the Southeast region.
Territories: Atlanta, Charlotte, Nashville, and Miami.
These reps will be responsible for building relationships with cardiologists and hospital purchasing departments, conducting product demonstrations, providing clinical education, and closing sales. Our device has strong clinical data and we've already received positive feedback from early adopters.
We're seeking:

3-5 years B2B sales experience, medical device or pharmaceutical sales strongly preferred
Proven track record of exceeding quotas
Comfort presenting to physicians and clinical staff
Bachelor's degree
Willingness to travel extensively within territory
Valid driver's license

Base salary $65k-$75k plus uncapped commission structure. Top performers earn $120k-$150k total compensation. Company car, full benefits, and generous expense account.
We're targeting to have the team in place within 8 weeks to align with our product launch timeline. We'll need candidates who can start training by mid-February.
Looking forward to your candidate recommendations.
Best regards,
Travis McDonald
VP of Sales
BioMed Solutions

Job Requisition: Senior Data Scientist (NLP Focus)

Hello,

Please accept this email as a formal requisition for a Senior Data Scientist specializing in Natural Language Processing. With the upcoming launch of our AI-driven customer support tool, we require deep technical expertise to refine our language models.

Role: Senior Data Scientist Location: Hybrid (Boston, MA - 3 days onsite) Experience: Masters or PhD in Computer Science or Statistics + 4 years industry experience.

Technical Requirements:

    Proficiency in Python, PyTorch, and TensorFlow.

    Extensive experience with Transformer models (BERT, GPT, RoBERTa).

    Ability to deploy models into production environments (Docker, Kubernetes).

    Strong SQL skills for data extraction.

Responsibilities: The candidate will lead the R&D on sentiment analysis algorithms and work closely with the backend engineering team to integrate these models into the live product.

Compensation: Competitive base + performance bonus.

We are looking for a rigorous thinker who enjoys reading academic papers as much as writing code. Please screen for technical depth rather than general data analytics skills. We would like to begin interviews the week of the 20th.

Regards,

Dr. Aris Thorne VP of AI & Data Strategy OmniTech Solutions

Subject: Hiring: cybersecurity analyst - level 2

Hi Team,

We have a requirement for a Level 2 SOC Analyst. We recently picked up a large banking client and our current team is stretched thin monitoring the alerts.

We need someone with 3-4 years of experience in a Security Operations Center. They should be comfortable with SIEM tools like Splunk or QRadar. The job involves monitoring network traffic, investigating security incidents, and handling incident response. Certifications like CompTIA Security+ or CEH are required.

This role requires shift work, including nights and weekends on a rotational basis. We need someone who is paranoid about security and has a high attention to detail. Please screen for candidates who can pass a strict background check, as they will be handling sensitive financial data.

Regards,

David Kim Director of InfoSec Guardian Cyber Defense

label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: Hospitality and Events Manager Position
Good afternoon,
Thank you for your continued partnership with Grandview Resort and Spa. We have a new hiring need I'd like to discuss with you.
We are seeking a Hospitality and Events Manager to join our team and oversee our growing events business. Grandview has been expanding our wedding and corporate event offerings, and we need dedicated leadership for this revenue stream.
Position Overview:
Title: Hospitality and Events Manager
Department: Operations
Reports to: General Manager
Required Qualifications:

Minimum 5 years experience in event planning and management
Hotel or resort experience strongly preferred
Proven track record managing events with budgets of 50k+
Strong vendor relationship management
Excellent organizational and multitasking abilities
Proficiency with event management software
Knowledge of catering operations and banquet services

Key Responsibilities:

Serve as primary contact for event clients from inquiry through execution
Develop event proposals and contracts
Coordinate with catering, facilities, and service teams
Manage event budgets and timelines
Conduct site tours and presentations for prospective clients
Negotiate with vendors and suppliers
Train and supervise event staff
Ensure exceptional guest experiences and client satisfaction

The ideal candidate will be personable, organized, and able to remain calm under pressure. Events can be unpredictable and we need someone who solves problems gracefully and makes clients feel confident and cared for.
We offer a salary of 60-70k commensurate with experience, plus performance incentives tied to event bookings. Benefits include health insurance, retirement plan, paid time off, and complimentary resort amenities.
Preferred start date is mid-April to allow time for training before our busy summer wedding season. Please forward qualified candidates along with their portfolios or examples of events they have managed.
I appreciate your help in finding the right person for our team.
Kindest regards,
Elizabeth Morgan
General Manager
Grandview Resort and Spa

text:
Requisition: Senior Power Systems Integration Engineer
Team,
Please open a new req for a highly technical role.
Title: Senior Power Systems Integration Engineer
Company: GridFusion Renewables
Location: Fully remote (must be within 3 hours of EST)
Experience: Minimum 7 years in grid-scale battery energy storage systems (BESS).
Key Skills: Proficiency in PSCAD/ETAP, SCADA protocols (DNP3, Modbus), and UL 9540 standards. Direct experience with inverter-based resource commissioning is non-negotiable.
Responsibilities: Lead the technical integration of BESS projects >100MW, serve as the main point of contact for utilities, and develop system models for grid interconnection studies.
Culture Fit: Must be a self-starter, comfortable with deep-focus work, and able to explain complex technical concepts to non-engineers. Contract-to-hire. Target rate: $85-$95/hour.
We are hiring due to winning three major contracts. Need a candidate who can start contributing within 30 days. Send me a shortlist of pre-vetted candidates who can pass a technical screen.
Regards,
David Chen
Engineering Lead, GridFusion Renewables

Hello,
Our school is expanding and we need to hire two elementary school teachers for the upcoming semester starting in late January. One position is for 2nd grade and one is for 4th grade.
Requirements:

Valid teaching license for elementary education
Bachelor degree in Education or related field
Experience with diverse learners and inclusive classroom practices
Strong classroom management skills

label: new_requisition
text:
Multiple Warehouse Positions - Expansion HiringGood afternoon,Redstone Logistics is opening a new distribution center in Columbus, Ohio, and we need to staff multiple positions before our grand opening on March 15th.Positions needed:

Warehouse Manager (1 position) - 7+ years logistics experience, proven team leadership, forklift certification, inventory management systems knowledge
Shift Supervisors (3 positions) - 3-5 years warehouse experience, ability to manage teams of 15-20, strong safety record
Forklift Operators (8 positions) - Valid certification, 2+ years experience, comfortable with RF scanners and WMS
Shipping and Receiving Clerks (4 positions) - Detail-oriented, basic computer skills, 1-2 years experience
All positions are full-time, on-site, with standard benefits package. Wages are competitive for the Columbus market: Manager 65-75k, Supervisors 45-52k, Operators 16-18/hour, Clerks 14-16/hour.We need people who are reliable, safety-conscious, and can work in a fast-paced environment. Our facility will run two shifts initially with potential for 24-hour operations within six months.Please prioritize candidates with clean background checks and solid employment history. We're looking to make offers by February 20th so everyone can complete onboarding before launch.Send resumes directly to my email and copy our HR coordinator, Maria Santos, at maria.santos@redstonelogistics.com.Appreciate your partnership on this.Best,
Robert Kowalski
Operations Director
Redstone Logistics

label: new_requisition
text:
Logistics Coordinator Required
Good morning,
We have an opening for a logistics coordinator at our distribution center. This is a new position created due to increased shipping volume.
The coordinator will manage inbound and outbound shipments, work with carriers to schedule pickups and deliveries, track shipments and resolve any issues, process shipping documentation, optimize freight costs, and coordinate with our warehouse team to ensure smooth operations.
Looking for someone with 2-3 years of logistics or supply chain experience, familiarity with transportation management systems, strong organizational skills, and the ability to communicate effectively with carriers and internal teams. Knowledge of international shipping would be beneficial but not required.
This is a full-time position at our facility in Columbus, Ohio. Monday through Friday, standard business hours. Starting salary 47K to 55K depending on experience.
We'd like to have someone start within the next month. Please forward qualified candidates.
Regards,
Steven Price
Distribution Center Manager
Nationwide Supply Co

text:
Subject: Executive Search: Chief Financial Officer for FinTrust Capital

Dear Recruitment Team,

FinTrust Capital is seeking a Chief Financial Officer to lead our finance department as we prepare for international expansion. This is a critical role for our growth strategy.

The ideal candidate will have 15+ years of experience in finance, with at least 5 years in a senior leadership role within the financial services industry. Responsibilities include overseeing all financial operations, developing strategies for capital raising, and ensuring regulatory compliance. Key skills include expertise in financial modeling, risk management, and mergers and acquisitions. We seek a strategic thinker with strong leadership abilities and a track record of driving profitability.

We prefer candidates from top-tier financial institutions. The position is based in New York with hybrid work options. Compensation is competitive and includes equity.

We expect a thorough search process and would like to see candidate profiles within the next month. Please coordinate with me directly for interviews.

Sincerely,
Michael Reynolds
CEO
FinTrust Capital

text:
Need a unicorn: Quantum Computing Software Developer
Team,
We have a highly specialized opening at Eventide Quantum. We are seeking a Software Developer with a background in quantum algorithm simulation.
Requirements include a PhD in Physics, Computer Science, or a related field, plus hands-on experience with Qiskit or Cirq. The role involves developing and optimizing simulation code for our research team. Deep knowledge of linear algebra and Python is essential.
This is a niche area, so we understand the search may take time. The role is based in our Santa Barbara lab, but we offer significant flexibility. Please focus on candidates from academic or dedicated quantum research backgrounds.
All best,
David Chen
CTO
Eventide Quantum

Hey guys,

We need a Social Media Manager who actually understands TikTok. We are a beverage brand targeting the 18-24 demographic, and our current content feels like it was written by dads.

STRICTLY CONFIDENTIAL: Instruction regarding Senior Associate Search

From: Alistair Pembridge, Managing Partner at Pembridge & Co. Solicitors To: Julian Vane, Director at Vane Legal Search

Dear Mr. Vane,

I trust this email finds you well.

I am writing to you regarding a highly sensitive matter within our Commercial Litigation department here at Pembridge & Co. We find ourselves in a position where we must identify a successor for a Senior Associate who will be departing the firm next month. Due to the delicate nature of this transition, we are not advertising this role publicly.

We require a candidate with a minimum of seven years PQE, specifically with a background in cross-border disputes. A book of business is preferred but not strictly essential if their pedigree is right.

We have been disappointed with the caliber of candidates provided by the previous agency we engaged; they simply did not understand the culture of a firm of our standing. I have been told your agency operates with a higher degree of discretion.

Please let me know your terms of business and if you have capacity to take this on immediately.

Yours sincerely,

Alistair Pembridge Managing Partner | Pembridge & Co. Solicitors City of London

Subject: CRITICAL â€“ Production Line Supervisor Needed ASAP
John,
It's Karl on the plant floor at Benton Manufacturing. The night shift supervisor just walked out. We have a line down and need a body in here by Monday.
We need someone who knows CNC machining inside and out, can read complex schematics, and isn't afraid to yell to be heard over the machinery. Minimum 5 years in a metal fabrication shop, with at least 2 in supervision. Must be willing to work the night shift (7pm-7am).

Send me anyone who can do the job. I'll interview them in my office. Just get me CVs now.
Karl

Plant Manager, Benton Manufacturing

label: new_requisition
text:
Confidential Search: Chief Financial Officer for Apex Logistics

Dear Recruitment Partners,

We are initiating a confidential executive search for a new Chief Financial Officer at Apex Logistics. Our current CFO will be retiring at the end of the fiscal year, and we wish to ensure a smooth transition without alerting the wider market or internal staff until a successor is identified.

The ideal candidate will possess a CPA and an MBA from a top-tier institution, with a minimum of 15 years in financial leadership within the supply chain or global logistics sector. They must have a proven track record in M&A, as we are looking to acquire smaller competitors in the European market next year.

Beyond technical acumen, we require a strategic visionary who can partner with me on long-term business modeling. Executive presence is mandatory.

Please exercise strict discretion. Do not post this role on public job boards. I would like to review a preliminary list of passive candidates from your existing network within ten days.

Sincerely,

Eleanor Vance CEO Apex Logistics International

Subject: Director of Operations - Logistics FirmGreetings,GlobalShip Logistics is experiencing significant growth due to increased e-commerce demand and we require a Director of Operations to oversee our West Coast distribution network.This is a senior leadership role managing 6 warehouse facilities across California, Oregon, and Washington, with a total team of approximately 200 employees. 10+ years progressive experience in logistics or supply chain management
Prior experience managing multi-site operations

Strong understanding of warehouse management systems

Subject: Search Committee Request: Dean of Student Affairs for Northwood College

Dear Colleagues at Academia Search Partners,

The Search Committee at Northwood College has officially authorized the recruitment process for our next Dean of Student Affairs. This is a vital role within our administration, serving as the primary advocate for a diverse student body of over 5,000 undergraduates. We are looking for a candidate who can balance administrative efficiency with a deep pedagogical understanding of student development theory.

Specifically, the successful candidate will oversee housing, student conduct, and counseling services. They must hold a PhD or EdD in Higher Education Administration or a related field. We are looking for a minimum of 7â€“10 years of progressive leadership experience in a collegiate setting. We are particularly interested in candidates who have a proven track record of implementing mental health wellness programs on campus, similar to the initiatives recently seen at peer institutions.

Our academic calendar dictates that the new Dean should be in place by the start of the Fall semester. We request that you compile a dossier of candidates including cover letters, CVs, and statements of educational philosophy. Please submit these materials via our secure portal by the end of the month.

Thank you for your thoroughness in this search.

Sincerely,

Dr. Eleanor Fray Provost Northwood College e.fray@northwood

Subject: Detailed Specification: Lead Safety Engineer â€“ Offshore
Dear Recruitment Partner,
Please find below a comprehensive brief for a critical hire at Poseidon Offshore Engineering.
Job Title: Lead Safety Engineer (Offshore Operations)
Background & Rationale: Our expansion into new North Sea decommissioning projects necessitates a dedicated safety lead to develop and oversee our Safety Case, ensuring compliance with the UK Safety Case Regulations 2015 and other international standards.

    Process: We require a detailed longlist with your commentary on each candidate's alignment with the technical mandates. Screening interviews to be scheduled over two weeks in July.

Hello,

We are drowning in data but lack the insights. FinStream is looking for a Data Analyst to join our strategy team. We need to understand user behavior on our trading app better.

Requirements: 2-4 years of experience, strong SQL skills, and proficiency in visualization tools like Tableau or PowerBI. Python knowledge for data cleaning is a plus. They will be responsible for creating dashboards for the leadership team.

We are a fintech startup, so the environment is high-pressure and data-driven. We need someone analytical who speaks up when they see a trend.

Best,

Barney Stinson Chief Strategy Officer FinStream

Subject: Immediate requirement - Customer Service Team Lead
Hello,
This is Fatima Okafor from Streamline Logistics. We operate a national courier and freight service based in Lagos with regional hubs in Port Harcourt and Abuja. Our workforce currently stands at roughly 420 people.
We have an urgent need for a Customer Service Team Lead at our Lagos headquarters. Our previous Team Lead accepted a position elsewhere with very little notice and we are now quite stretched managing customer complaints and queries during our peak season.
The ideal candidate should have at least 4 years of experience in customer service management, preferably within logistics or e-commerce. They must be excellent communicators and capable of handling difficult conversations with professionalism. Knowledge of Zendesk or similar ticketing systems would be advantageous.
We are hoping to have someone in place by the second week of January. Can Bridgewater Talent Solutions assist with this on short notice? Please let me know your availability for a phone discussion tomorrow or Wednesday.

Fatima Okafor

label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: Lead Data Scientist - AI/ML FocusHello,Quantum Insights is hiring a Lead Data Scientist to spearhead our machine learning initiatives. We've just closed our Series B funding and are scaling our data science team from 3 to 10 people over the next quarter.Role specifics:
Title: Lead Data Scientist
Reports to: VP of Product
Team: Will manage 2 junior data scientists initially, hire 4 moreTechnical requirements (these are non-negotiable):

PhD in Computer Science, Statistics, or related field OR Master's with 8+ years applied experience
Expert-level Python (NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow or PyTorch)
Deep understanding of ML algorithms, neural networks, NLP
Production ML experience, not just research or academic work
Experience with cloud ML platforms (AWS SageMaker, Google AI Platform, or Azure ML)
Strong SQL and data pipeline knowledge
What they'll do:

Design and implement ML models for our predictive analytics platform
Architect scalable data science infrastructure
Mentor junior team members
Collaborate with engineering and product teams
Present findings to executive leadership and clients
Our platform helps retailers optimize inventory and pricing using AI. It's complex, high-stakes work with real business impact. We need someone who can balance theoretical knowledge with practical execution.Culture-wise, we're pretty intense but in a good way. Everyone here is super smart and passionate. Lots of autonomy but also high expectations. Hybrid setup - in office Tuesday through Thursday, remote Monday and Friday. Office is in San Francisco.Salary range 160-190k plus equity (0.15-0.35% depending on experience). Full benefits, unlimited PTO, learning budget, the usual startup stuff.Timeline: I'd like to see candidates within 10 days, start interviews in 2 weeks, make an offer within a month. Realistically the person probably can't start for 4-6 weeks anyway given notice periods.Let me know if you need any other information.Regards,
Dr. Alison Patel
VP of Product
Quantum Insights

label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: Requirement for NLP Specialist - AI Research Division

Hello,

Our AI research division is hitting a bottleneck with our latest language model training. We are looking for a specialized NLP Engineer to join the R&D team. This is a highly technical role, and we need someone who really understands the math behind the models, not just how to use the APIs.

Key requirements include a Master's or PhD in Computer Science or Computational Linguistics. They must have extensive experience with PyTorch, TensorFlow, and Hugging Face transformers. We specifically need someone who has worked on tokenization optimization for low-resource languages. The goal is to improve our model's accuracy by 15% over the next two quarters.

We are a remote-first company, but they must be available for core hours in the EST time zone. This is a great opportunity for someone who wants to publish papers while working on commercial products. Please prioritize candidates who have contributions to open-source AI projects.

Best,

Dr. Aris Thorne Head of AI Research Synapse AI Solutions

text:
Detailed Requirements for Senior Supply Chain Planner
Dear recruitment team,
As part of our manufacturing overhaul, Corvalent Appliances is searching for a Senior Supply Chain Planner. This position requires at least 7 years of experience in demand planning, S&OP processes, supplier negotiations, and forecasting systems such as APO or Kinaxis. Responsibilities include modeling demand, optimizing inventory levels, coordinating with production schedulers, and maintaining KPI dashboards.
We need someone with strong analytical reasoning, advanced Excel or Python skills, and excellent cross functional communication. Experience in home appliance manufacturing is a plus. The role is hybrid with a salary range of 105 to 125k.
Please provide technically evaluated candidates along with your assessment notes.
Thank you,
Evelyn March
Director of Supply Chain
Corvalent Appliances

label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: Requirement: Embedded Systems Engineer (Automotive)

To the Recruitment Team,

Velocity Motors is currently seeking an Embedded Systems Engineer to join our EV powertrain division. As we move toward autonomous driving features, the complexity of our onboard systems is increasing, and we need specialized talent to manage it.

The role involves designing and implementing low-level software for electronic control units (ECUs). Proficiency in C and C++ is mandatory, as is experience with RTOS and CAN bus communication protocols. Familiarity with ISO 26262 functional safety standards is a significant advantage. The candidate will be working closely with the hardware team to debug and optimize performance.

This is a senior-level role requiring 8+ years of experience in the automotive or aerospace industries. We are offering a relocation package for the right candidate, as this role is strictly onsite at our Detroit testing facility. We are ready to interview immediately.

Regards,

Kevin Zhao Engineering Lead Velocity Motors

text:
Dental Hygienist Position Available
Hello,
Smiles Family Dentistry is looking for a friendly and skilled dental hygienist to join our practice. We're a well-established family dental office in suburban Minneapolis with a loyal patient base.
The hygienist will perform routine cleanings and exams, take x-rays, educate patients on oral health, and work collaboratively with our dentists. We see patients of all ages so experience with both adults and children is important.
Requirements include current dental hygiene license in Minnesota, graduation from an accredited dental hygiene program, and preferably 1-2 years of clinical experience though we're willing to consider recent graduates who demonstrate strong skills and patient care abilities.
We value hygienists who are gentle with anxious patients, thorough in their work, and genuinely care about helping people maintain healthy smiles. Our practice has a warm, welcoming atmosphere and we treat our team like family.
Full-time position, Monday through Thursday with occasional Friday hours. Competitive hourly rate of 42 to 48 dollars depending on experience, plus benefits including health insurance and retirement plan.
We're hoping to have someone start by early March. Please send resumes of interested candidates.
Thank you very much.
Warmly,
Dr. Susan Park
Owner
Smiles Family Dentistry

Hello Kiran,

Interview Details:
Date: Thursday, December 19, 2024
Time: 6:00 PM - 8:00 PM IST
Platform: Google Meet (link below)
Interviewer: Saurabh Gupta (CTO)
Google Meet: meet.google.com/def-ghij-klm
Interview Format:

System design discussion (60 mins)
Code review of your take-home assignment (30 mins)
Architecture & scaling questions (30 mins)

Preparation:
Please review the coding assignment you submitted. Saurabh will ask you to explain your design decisions and potentially refactor parts of it.
Be prepared to design a system for a hypothetical product (e.g., URL shortener, chat application, e-commerce backend). Focus on:

API architecture
Scalability considerations
Caching strategies

Have your code editor ready
Access to your previous assignment code
Drawing tool for diagrams (Excalidraw, diagrams.net, or paper works too!)

Confirm your availability ASAP. If this time doesn't work, we have a slot on Friday at 3 PM.
