label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: Junior Graphic Designer Position
Hi,
Brightwave Marketing is a boutique agency in Brooklyn and we're looking for a Junior Graphic Designer to support our creative team. We work with clients in hospitality, food & beverage, and lifestyle brands.
This is perfect for someone 1-2 years out of design school who wants to grow their skills in a collaborative environment. They'll work on everything from social media graphics to print materials to basic web design.
Must be proficient in Adobe Creative Suite, especially Photoshop and Illustrator. Bonus points for motion graphics or video editing skills. We care more about potential and attitude than years of experience.
It's a full-time role in our Williamsburg office. We're a small team of 11 and everyone wears multiple hats. The vibe is creative, supportive, and we genuinely like each other. $42k-$48k to start with room to grow.
Can you connect us with some talented young designers? We'd love to review portfolios.
Thanks!
Alicia Park
Creative Director
Brightwave Marketing

To ConstructCrew Staffing,

BuildMatrix Constructors requires a Site Safety Manager for our new commercial development project in the metro area. The project duration is estimated at 18 months.

The role involves conducting daily site inspections, ensuring OSHA compliance, and managing safety training for subcontractors. The required candidate must hold a CSP (Certified Safety Professional) designation and have a minimum of 8 years of field experience in commercial high-rise construction. Experience with unions is preferred.

We are accepting candidate submissions until the 15th. Please direct all resumes and certification verifications to my office. Interviews will be conducted via video conference followed by a site visit for finalists.

Regards,

Tom Kowalski Operations Director BuildMatrix Constructors t.kowalski@buildmatrix

text:
Subject: Compliance Officer - Banking

Dear Recruitment Agency,

We are looking to hire a Compliance Officer to join our Risk Department. With the new banking regulations coming into effect next year, we need to bolster our team.

The candidate should have 3 to 5 years of experience in regulatory compliance within the banking sector. They will be responsible for monitoring transactions for money laundering (AML) and ensuring our policies align with federal laws.

This is a detail-oriented role for someone who enjoys reading fine print and enforcing rules. Certifications like CAMS are highly desirable.

Sincerely,

James Sterling Chief Risk Officer Capital Trust Bank

label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: Executive Search Request for Chief Growth Officer

Hello,

My name is Daniel Rourke, CEO of Valeon Financial Systems based in Minneapolis. We are preparing for a major expansion into enterprise lending software and need your assistance with a discreet executive search for a Chief Growth Officer.

We are seeking someone with at least 12 years of experience in B2B fintech sales, proven leadership of large teams, and a track record scaling revenue beyond 50M annually. Responsibilities include shaping our commercial strategy, building a global sales organization, and guiding partnerships with financial institutions. Cultural expectations: strategic mindset, resilience, and high ethical standards.

We would appreciate a curated shortlist within three weeks. Candidates should undergo thorough reference checks before introduction. Please confirm receipt so we can forward our strategic brief.

Best regards,
Daniel

label: new_requisition
text:
Cybersecurity Analyst RequiredGood afternoon,Our IT department is expanding and we have an opening for a cybersecurity analyst. This position has been approved as part of our enhanced security initiatives following recent industry threats.Required qualifications include a bachelor's degree in computer science or related field, relevant certifications such as CISSP or CEH, and minimum 4 years of hands-on experience in cybersecurity. The analyst will be responsible for monitoring network traffic, conducting vulnerability assessments, responding to security incidents, implementing security protocols, and providing security training to staff.Technical skills needed: firewall management, intrusion detection systems, SIEM tools, penetration testing, and knowledge of compliance frameworks such as GDPR and HIPAA.We require someone with strong analytical thinking, attention to detail, and the ability to communicate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders. This is a serious role protecting sensitive client data.The position is based in our Boston office with hybrid flexibility after the initial training period. Salary range is 85K to 100K with excellent benefits package.Kindly submit candidate profiles along with their certifications and experience details. We plan to interview candidates over the next month and make a hiring decision by early February.Yours professionally,
Kenneth Obi
Director of Information Technology
Beacon Financial Services

Dear Recruitment Team,

I am writing to initiate a retained executive search for a Chief Financial Officer for OmniGlobal Holdings. Our current CFO will be retiring at the end of the year, and we require a seamless transition given the upcoming merger discussions. This search must remain strictly confidential.

We require a seasoned executive with at least 15 years of financial leadership experience in the fintech or banking sectors. The candidate must have a proven track record of managing mergers and acquisitions, as well as experience with IPO readiness. They will report directly to the Board of Directors and will be responsible for capital structure, financial planning, and risk management.

We are looking for someone with gravitas and exceptional strategic vision. The compensation package includes a significant base salary, performance bonuses, and stock options. Please ensure all candidates sign an NDA before any specific details about our company are revealed. We expect a shortlist of highly vetted candidates within three weeks.

Regards,

Robert Sterling Chairman of the Board OmniGlobal Holdings

label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: Request for Senior Game Designer

Hey everyone,

We are ramping up production on our new RPG title and we need a Senior Game Designer to help shape the combat systems.

We need someone who has shipped at least one AAA title on console or PC. They need to be brilliant at balancing gameplay mechanics and math. Experience with Unreal Engine 5 is a must. They will be working closely with the level designers and the creative director to ensure the game feels rewarding and fun.

We have a very creative, collaborative studio culture. No suits, no rigid hours, just passion for games. However, we do crunch sometimes near milestones. We want someone who is actually a gamer and understands what makes a combat loop satisfying. Send us reels or portfolios that show off their system designs.

Cheers,

Dear Shreya,

Following your successful first-round interview, we are pleased to invite you to the second round for the Business Development Manager role at Innovate Consulting Group.

**Interview Schedule:**

Date: Wednesday, 18th December 2024
Time: 3:30 PM - 5:00 PM IST
Location: Innovate Consulting Group, 12th Floor, DLF Cyber City, Phase 3, Gurgaon - 122002

**Interviewers:**
- Ms. Ritu Sharma, Business Development Head (45 mins)
- Mr. Tarun Khosla, Director - Client Services (45 mins)

3. Q&A and salary discussion

**Items to bring:**
- Laptop with your presentation
- 2 printed copies of your presentation
- Updated CV (3 copies)
- Original degree certificates for verification

**Parking:** Complimentary parking available in the basement. Collect parking token from ground floor reception.

**Dress Code:** Business formals required.

A light refreshment will be provided. Please inform us if you have any dietary restrictions.

Kindly confirm your attendance by 6 PM on December 14th. If you need to reschedule due to any unavoidable circumstances, please inform us at the earliest.

For any queries, feel free to reach out to me on my direct line.

label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: Seeking Pediatric Nurse Practitioner
Good morning,
Riverside Children's Health Center is expanding our practice and we need to bring on another pediatric nurse practitioner.
Position details:
Role: Pediatric Nurse Practitioner
Setting: Outpatient clinic, general pediatrics
Schedule: Full-time, Monday-Friday, some Saturday mornings
Requirements:

Active NP license in the state
Pediatric certification required
2+ years clinical experience preferred but will consider new graduates
Comfortable with well-child visits, sick visits, minor procedures
EMR experience (we use Epic)
Excellent communication with children and families

Our practice has 4 physicians and 2 nurse practitioners currently. We see about 80-100 patients per day across the practice. It's a busy but supportive environment. Very family-friendly workplace.
Compensation is competitive for the area, around 95-105k based on experience, plus full benefits, malpractice coverage, CME allowance, 401k match.
We're hoping to have someone start by May 1st if possible. Patient load is getting heavy and we don't want to compromise care quality.
Please send over any qualified candidates. I'm happy to do phone screens quickly.
Thank you,
Dr. Susan Martinez
Medical Director
Riverside Children's Health Center

Subject: Hiring: Montessori Lead Guide for Toddler Classroom
Dear Agency,
Little Explorers Montessori is opening a second toddler classroom this fall and seeks a passionate AMI-certified Lead Guide for children aged 18 months to 3 years.
The role requires a full AMI diploma for the 0-3 age group and at least two years of lead teaching experience in an authentic Montessori environment. Responsibilities include preparing and maintaining the environment, conducting observations, and guiding parents.

label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: Electrical Engineer - Renewable Energy Projects

Good morning,

GreenTech Power Systems is expanding our engineering team to support our growing portfolio of solar and wind energy projects across the Pacific Northwest. We need an electrical engineer with a passion for sustainable energy solutions.

The role involves designing electrical systems for renewable energy installations, conducting site assessments, preparing technical specifications and drawings, coordinating with project managers and contractors during installation phases, and performing commissioning and testing of completed systems. The engineer will also provide technical support for troubleshooting and optimization of existing installations.

We require a bachelor's degree in electrical engineering, PE license preferred but not mandatory for the right candidate, and 4-7 years of experience in power systems design. Experience specifically with solar PV systems, energy storage, or wind turbines is highly desirable. Proficiency in AutoCAD, PVsyst, or similar design software is essential.

Beyond technical qualifications, we're looking for someone who shares our commitment to clean energy and wants to make a real impact on climate change. Strong project management skills and the ability to work effectively with diverse stakeholders are important.

This position is based in our Seattle office with significant field work visiting project sites throughout Washington and Oregon. Expect about 25 percent travel. Compensation package includes salary of 88K to 108K, performance bonuses, vehicle allowance for site visits, and excellent benefits.

We're aiming for a start date in late February or early March. Please submit resumes of qualified engineers who are excited about renewable energy.

Looking forward to your candidates.
Best regards,
Maya Sutherland
VP of Engineering
GreenTech Power Systems

text:
Subject: Requirement for Embedded Systems Engineer (Rust/C++)

Greetings,

We are initiating a search for a highly specialized Embedded Systems Engineer to join our R&D wing. As we move into the prototyping phase of our new autonomous drone fleet, we require expertise that is currently missing from our internal team.

The candidate must have a Master of Science in Electrical Engineering or Computer Science. The critical technical requirement is deep proficiency in Rust and C++ for real-time operating systems. They will be responsible for writing low-level firmware for flight control modules. Experience with PX4 autopilot software is highly desirable.

This is a senior individual contributor role. We are willing to pay above market rate for the right technical match. Since this work involves defense contracts, the candidate must be a citizen and able to obtain security clearance. Please vet specifically for the Rust experience, as that is the hardest skill to find.

Regards,

Dr. Elias Thorne Chief Technology Officer AeroVantage Systems

text:
Restaurant Manager - New Location OpeningHey!We're opening our fourth location of Harvest Kitchen in downtown Portland and need an experienced restaurant manager to lead the team.Looking for someone with at least 5 years in restaurant management, preferably in casual fine dining. They need to handle everything - hiring and training staff, managing inventory, ensuring food quality and service standards, handling customer issues, and basically keeping the place running like a well-oiled machine.We're farm-to-table focused so passion for sustainable food and local sourcing is important to us. Someone who understands our values and can communicate that to the team and customers.The schedule is demanding with nights and weekends obviously, but we offer competitive pay at 65K to 75K plus bonuses based on restaurant performance. label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: HR Business Partner - Technology Sector
Dear Colleague,
NexGen Software Solutions is scaling rapidly and we need an HR Business Partner to support our Engineering and Product departments. We've grown from 50 to 180 employees in the past year and our current HR team is stretched thin.
This HRBP will be a strategic partner to our VP of Engineering and VP of Product, supporting approximately 90 employees. Responsibilities include talent planning, employee relations, performance management coaching, compensation analysis, organizational design, and leading initiatives around employee engagement and retention.
We're looking for someone who:

Has 5-7 years progressive HR experience, tech industry highly preferred
Understands the unique challenges of managing technical talent
Can influence senior leaders without direct authority
Has experience with high-growth environments
Is data-driven in their approach to HR metrics and decision-making
Holds PHR or SPHR certification (preferred but not required)

Our company culture is innovative, fast-paced, and collaborative. We value transparency and give our team members significant autonomy. The right person will thrive in ambiguity and enjoy building programs from scratch.
Based in Seattle with hybrid flexibility. Salary range $85k-$100k plus equity grant and excellent benefits including unlimited PTO and professional development stipend.
We're hoping to have someone start by early March. Please send over profiles of HR professionals who have successfully navigated scaling organizations.
Looking forward to working together on this.
Warm regards,
Samantha Yee
Head of People Operations
NexGen Software Solutions

Hello recruitment team,

Warehouse Shift Supervisor - Night Shift

Hi Team,

We are seeing a bottleneck in our outbound shipments during the night shift. We need to hire a Warehouse Shift Supervisor to tighten up operations at our distribution center in Memphis.

The role is for the 10 PM to 6 AM shift. We need someone who has experience with WMS (Warehouse Management Systems) and can manage a team of 30 forklift drivers and packers. Safety is our number one priority, so they must be certified in safety protocols. We need a problem solver who can fix issues when management is not around.

Please look for candidates with experience in logistics companies like FedEx or DHL. We need to fill this role to reduce our overtime costs.

Gary Wilson Logistics Manager SwiftMove Logistics

label: new_requisition
text:
Senior DevOps Engineer - Kubernetes Expert Needed
Hi,
Streamline Software needs a senior DevOps engineer who really knows their stuff, specifically around Kubernetes and container orchestration.
Here's the deal - we're migrating our entire infrastructure from VMs to containerized microservices and it's more complex than we anticipated. We need someone who's done this before and can lead the technical implementation.
Must haves:

6+ years DevOps/Infrastructure experience
Deep Kubernetes knowledge (we're talking production experience managing K8s clusters at scale, not just tutorials)
Strong with Terraform, Ansible, or similar IaC tools
CI/CD pipeline expertise (Jenkins, GitLab CI, ArgoCD, etc.)
Monitoring and observability (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK stack)
Security best practices for containerized environments
Scripting skills (Python, Bash, Go)

Nice to haves:

Service mesh experience (Istio, Linkerd)
Multi-cloud experience (we use both AWS and GCP)
Experience with Helm charts

What they'll actually be doing:

Leading our container migration project
Designing and implementing our K8s infrastructure
Setting up monitoring, logging, alerting for the new environment
Working with development teams on containerization strategies
Establishing best practices and documentation
On-call rotation (1 week per month)

We're a 80-person software company making workflow automation tools for healthcare. Fast-paced environment, lots of interesting technical challenges. Team is smart and collaborative.
Remote work is fine but we have a slight preference for someone who can come to our Seattle office occasionally (once a month or so). Salary range 130-155k plus equity and full benefits.
Timeline is flexible but sooner is better. This is a key role for us right now.
Questions? Let me know.
Thanks,
Kevin Park
CTO
Streamline Software

Hello Recruitment Partners,

Subject: Help needed - several sales positions to fill
Hey Jordan,
Annika here from Horizon Renewable Energy. We're based in Copenhagen but have projects all over Scandinavia. About 220 employees now after merging with a smaller solar company last year.
We're ramping up our sales division and need to hire 5 Sales Representatives and 1 Sales Manager basically immediately. We've secured funding for several large wind farm projects and need people who can go out and actually close deals with commercial clients and municipalities.
The thing is we need people who can hit the ground running. Our last batch of hires from another recruiter was honestly pretty disappointing â€“ lots of talk about consultative selling but when it came down to it they couldn't handle objections or negotiate terms effectively.
We're looking for hungry people with B2B experience, preferably in energy or construction sectors, who won't be intimidated by long sales cycles. Fluent English is required; Danish or Swedish is a bonus but not essential.
Can you get back to me this week with an idea of timeline and what you'd need from us? We're trying to have everyone onboarded by February.

We Need Your Help - HR Generalist
Good afternoon,
Our company is at an inflection point and we need to bring on an HR Generalist who can help us professionalize our people operations. We have grown from 15 to 60 people in the past year and our HR processes have not kept pace.
What we need:

Someone with 4-6 years of generalist HR experience
Knowledge of employment law and compliance
Experience with HRIS systems (we use BambooHR)
Strong interpersonal skills and ability to handle sensitive situations
Background in benefits administration and employee relations

This person will be our second HR hire and will work closely with our HR Director. They will handle onboarding, benefits enrollment, policy development, employee inquiries, and support our performance review process.
We are based in Minneapolis, hybrid work model (2 days remote), salary is $68k-$78k with full benefits. We are a tech company with a casual, collaborative culture and we value people who bring both professionalism and warmth to the role.
Can we schedule a call to discuss your recruitment process and timeline?

HR Director
Innovate Labs

label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: Executive Search - Chief Marketing OfficerDear Recruitment Partner,I hope this message finds you well. Bellridge Pharmaceuticals is entering an exciting phase of growth following the successful FDA approval of our flagship pain management therapy, and we are seeking a Chief Marketing Officer to lead our commercial strategy.This is a critical executive hire reporting directly to our CEO. The ideal candidate will have 15+ years of pharmaceutical marketing experience, including at least 5 years in a senior leadership capacity. They should have a proven track record of successful product launches in the specialty pharmacy space, particularly in pain management or neurology.Key responsibilities include developing go-to-market strategies, leading a team of 40+ marketing professionals, managing relationships with healthcare providers and payers, and overseeing a $25M annual marketing budget. The role requires someone with exceptional strategic thinking, strong P&L management experience, and the ability to navigate complex regulatory environments.We are prepared to offer a compensation package in the range of $280k-$350k base salary plus performance bonuses and equity. The position is based in our Princeton, New Jersey headquarters with limited travel required.Given the seniority of this role, we would appreciate a highly curated shortlist of 3-4 candidates who meet these specific criteria. We are targeting to have someone in place by the end of Q2, so a thorough but timely search would be ideal.Please let me know if you require any additional information about our company culture, benefits package, or the specifics of our organizational structure.Warm regards,
Elizabeth Hartmann
Vice President of Human Resources
Bellridge Pharmaceuticals

label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: Legal Counsel Position - Detailed Requirements

Dear Team,

Please find below the specifications for the Legal Counsel position we are opening at Peterson & Associates. We require a candidate to handle our internal corporate compliance and contract negotiations.

The candidate must possess a Juris Doctor degree from an accredited law school and be a member in good standing of the State Bar. We require a minimum of 5 years of experience in corporate law, with a specific focus on intellectual property and software licensing agreements. The primary responsibility will be drafting and reviewing complex SaaS contracts, managing our trademark portfolio, and advising the executive team on data privacy regulations including GDPR and CCPA.

Attention to detail is paramount. We need someone who is meticulous and risk-averse. The candidate should be comfortable working in a quiet, structured environment. Please ensure that all applicants provide a writing sample regarding a recent change in technology law. We are looking to conduct first-round interviews via Zoom next week.

Sincerely,

Eleanor Vance Human Resources Director Peterson & Associates

label: new_requisition
text:
HR Generalist Opening
Dear Recruitment Partner,
Coastal Insurance Group is seeking an HR generalist to join our human resources department. We are a regional insurance company with approximately 120 employees across four offices.
The HR generalist will handle a variety of responsibilities including recruitment and onboarding, employee relations, benefits administration, HRIS maintenance, policy implementation, compliance with employment laws, and supporting performance management processes.
We're looking for someone with 3-5 years of HR experience, preferably with a mix of both tactical and strategic HR work. PHR or SHRM-CP certification is preferred. Strong interpersonal skills, discretion with confidential information, and a proactive approach to problem-solving are essential.
This position is based in our headquarters in Portland, Maine. Standard business hours with occasional flexibility needed for employee meetings or special projects. Salary range is 55K to 65K plus comprehensive benefits.
We're looking to fill this position by mid-February. Please send resumes of qualified candidates and we'll schedule interviews promptly.
Thank you for your assistance with this search.
Professionally yours,
Nathan Cross
Chief Administrative Officer
Coastal Insurance Group

text:
Program Coordinator for Youth Outreach

Hello,

Our non-profit, City Youth Forward, has received a new grant to expand our after-school mentorship programs. We are looking for a passionate Program Coordinator to manage this initiative.

The role involves coordinating volunteers, planning daily activities for teens, and tracking program metrics for our grant reports. The ideal candidate has a background in social work or education and at least 2 years of experience working with at-risk youth. They need to be empathetic, organized, and capable of working with limited resources.

The salary is modest, but the work is incredibly rewarding. We are looking for someone who aligns with our mission of empowering the next generation. We would like to have someone in place before the school year begins.

From: Marcus Thorne, CEO at Nebulon AI To: Sarah Jenkins, Lead Recruiter at CodeHunters

Hey Sarah,

Hope you are surviving the week.

We finally closed our Series A on Tuesday. It is great news but now the board is breathing down my neck to ship the beta by Q3 and my current team is drowning. I need to bring in 3 Senior Full Stack Engineers (Python/React) and 1 DevOps lead ASAP.

Can you guys handle this? We need people who have startup scars and do not mind a bit of chaos. Compensation is competitive + heavy equity.

Let me know if you have a slate available. I can hop on a Zoom anytime after 4pm PT today.

Best,

Marcus

label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: Looking for a Supply Chain Coordinator

Hello,

We are looking to hire a Supply Chain Coordinator for our logistics hub. We deal with international freight, and keeping track of containers is becoming a full-time job in itself.

The role involves coordinating shipments with overseas suppliers, managing customs documentation, and tracking deliveries to our domestic warehouses. The candidate needs to have strong Excel skills and be comfortable negotiating rates with freight forwarders. Experience with SAP is a plus.

We need someone who is organized and does not get flustered when things go wrong, because shipments get delayed all the time. It is a fast-paced environment. We are looking for a mid-level candidate with about 3 years of logistics experience.

Thanks,

Ben Foster Logistics Manager GlobalTrade Links

label: new_requisition
text:
Legal Secretary - Family Law Practice
Dear Hiring Professional,
Our family law practice is seeking an experienced legal secretary to support two of our attorneys. This is a replacement position as our current secretary is retiring after 20 years with the firm.
Responsibilities include managing attorney calendars, drafting legal documents and correspondence, filing court documents, communicating with clients and opposing counsel, maintaining case files, and general administrative support for a busy practice.
Required qualifications: minimum 3 years of legal secretary experience, preferably in family law. Must have excellent knowledge of legal terminology and procedures, strong typing and proofreading skills, proficiency in Microsoft Office and legal practice management software, and the ability to handle sensitive matters with professionalism and discretion.
This position requires someone who is organized, detail-oriented, empathetic when dealing with clients going through difficult situations, and able to manage multiple priorities effectively.
Full-time position in our Sacramento office, Monday through Friday. Salary range is 48K to 58K based on experience, plus benefits.
We would like to have someone start by late January to allow for some overlap and training with our retiring secretary. Please send resumes of qualified candidates.
Respectfully,
Jennifer Walsh
Office Manager
Morrison & Associates Law Firm

Subject: Great news! We are hiring a Program Coordinator

From: Sarah Tremblay, Executive Director at Youth Forward Canada To: David Chen, Recruiter at NonProfit HR

Hi David,

I hope you are having a wonderful week!

I am so excited to share that we finally received the Trillium grant we applied for last year. This means we have the funding secured to hire a full-time Program Coordinator for our after-school arts initiative.

We are looking for someone with a background in youth work and perhaps some experience with grant reporting, though that is teachable. The most important thing is that they have high energy and are great with teenagers.

Our budget is a bit tight, around 55k CAD, but we offer great benefits and a really supportive work environment.

Could you let me know what the timeline usually looks like for a search like this? We are hoping to have someone in place before the summer camps start in June.

Thank you so much for your help!

Sincerely,

Sarah

text:
Subject: Restaurant General Manager - Immediate Opening
Hello,
The Harbor Grill, an upscale seafood restaurant in Annapolis, requires a General Manager following the unexpected resignation of our previous GM. We're a busy establishment serving 200+ covers nightly during peak season.
Responsibilities include all front and back of house operations, staff scheduling and training, inventory management, vendor relationships, P&L oversight, and maintaining our reputation for exceptional service and cuisine.
Required background:

5+ years restaurant management experience, fine dining preferred
Strong wine knowledge
Proven ability to manage a team of 30+ employees
Experience with OpenTable and Toast POS systems
ServSafe Manager certification
Ability to work nights, weekends, and holidays

Salary $65k-$72k plus performance bonuses and dining privileges. Health benefits after 90 days.
We need someone who can start within two weeks as we're heading into our busy spring season. Please only submit candidates with verifiable fine dining management experience and excellent references.
Time is of the essence here.
Thank you,
Richard Costello
Owner
The Harbor Grill

Digital Marketing Specialist Opportunity
Dear Agency Team,
Sunset Realty Group is seeking a digital marketing specialist to enhance our online presence and lead generation efforts across our three real estate offices in Southern California.
This role encompasses social media management, email marketing campaigns, Google Ads and Facebook Ads management, content creation for listings and blog posts, website maintenance, and analytics reporting. The specialist will work closely with our agents to market properties effectively and attract potential buyers and sellers.
We're looking for someone with 3-5 years of digital marketing experience, preferably in real estate or a related industry. Must be proficient in social media platforms, email marketing tools, Google Analytics, and basic graphic design. Photography or video editing skills would be a valuable addition.
The ideal candidate is creative, data-driven, self-motivated, and understands the real estate market. This is a full-time position based in our main office in Irvine with some flexibility for remote work. Compensation is 62K to 75K plus performance bonuses.
We're hoping to fill this position within the next 4-6 weeks. Please send qualified candidates with portfolios showcasing their digital marketing work.

Subject: Sales Director - Enterprise SaaS
Good morning,
I am seeking your expertise in identifying a Sales Director to lead our enterprise sales efforts. We are a growing SaaS company with a strong product-market fit and are ready to aggressively scale our sales team.
The ideal candidate will have:

7-10 years of B2B SaaS sales experience
At least 3 years managing and developing sales teams
Proven track record of exceeding quotas and building pipeline
Experience with enterprise deals ($100k+ ACV)
Consultative selling approach and strong executive presence

This person will build and lead a team of Account Executives, develop sales strategies, own forecasting and reporting, and work closely with our CEO and marketing team.
Compensation structure: $140k base + uncapped commission with OTE of $240k-$280k for top performers. Equity package included. Position can be remote but preference for candidates in the Chicago area for occasional in-person collaboration.
We are moving quickly on this and would like to extend an offer by year end. Please prioritize candidates who are currently in similar roles and have demonstrated success at scaling sales organizations.
Thank you,
David Chu
Chief Revenue Officer
Vertex Software Group

label: new_requisition
text:
Food Safety Manager - Manufacturing Facility
To the Recruitment Team,
Golden Harvest Foods is hiring a food safety manager for our food processing facility in Fresno, California. This is a critical role ensuring compliance with all food safety regulations and maintaining our quality standards.
The manager will oversee HACCP plans, conduct internal audits, manage sanitation programs, train production staff on food safety protocols, coordinate with regulatory agencies during inspections, investigate any quality or safety incidents, and continuously improve our food safety management system.
Required qualifications: bachelor's degree in food science or related field, HACCP certification, SQF practitioner certification preferred, and minimum 5 years of experience in food manufacturing with at least 2 years in a supervisory capacity. Thorough knowledge of FDA regulations and food safety standards is essential.
This is a leadership position requiring strong attention to detail, problem-solving abilities, and excellent documentation skills. Must be comfortable working in a production environment and collaborating with cross-functional teams.
Full-time position, Monday through Friday with occasional weekend coverage needed during audits or production issues. Salary range of 75K to 90K plus benefits.
Please send qualified candidates with relevant certifications and experience in food manufacturing. We're targeting a start date in late January or early February.
Best regards,
Angela Torres
Human Resources Director
Golden Harvest Foods

label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: Urgent: Senior Backend Engineer needed for Series A scaling

Hi Team,

I hope you are doing well. We have some exciting news over here at FluxStream. We just closed our Series A funding round yesterday, and that means we need to scale our engineering team immediately. The platform is starting to buckle under the new user load, and we cannot afford any downtime.

We are looking for a Senior Backend Engineer who eats Python and Django for breakfast. They need to have at least 6 years of experience, specifically in high-traffic environments. Experience with AWS and containerization is non-negotiable. We need someone who can come in, audit our current architecture, and start optimizing code from day one.

The culture here is fast-paced and scrappy. We are all wearing multiple hats, so we need someone who does not need their hand held. We are offering competitive equity and a solid base salary. Please send over your top three candidates by Thursday. We are looking to interview this weekend.

Best regards,
Alex Chen Founder & CEO FluxStream Technologies

text:
Chief Marketing Officer Search - Executive PlacementDear Recruitment Team,I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out on behalf of Northbridge Capital Partners to engage your services for a critical executive search.We are seeking a Chief Marketing Officer to join our leadership team and drive our brand positioning as we expand into the European market. This is a newly created position reporting directly to our CEO.Key Requirements:

12+ years of progressive marketing leadership experience
Proven track record in financial services or B2B SaaS
International market expansion experience essential
Strong digital marketing and brand strategy background
MBA from a top-tier institution preferred
Responsibilities will include developing our global marketing strategy, building and leading a team of 15-20 marketing professionals, managing a budget of approximately 8 million dollars annually, and serving as a key voice in our executive decision-making process.The ideal candidate will demonstrate exceptional strategic thinking, stakeholder management capabilities, and the ability to operate effectively in a fast-paced private equity environment. Cultural fit is paramount; we value intellectual rigor, collaborative leadership, and results-driven execution.Compensation package will be highly competitive, including base salary in the range of 220k-280k, performance bonus structure, equity participation, and comprehensive executive benefits.We would appreciate receiving a long-list of 8-10 qualified candidates within three weeks, followed by a short-list of 3-4 candidates for first-round interviews. Please include detailed profiles with career progression, notable achievements, and references.I am available to discuss this search in greater detail at your convenience.Best regards,
Patricia Williamson
Chief Human Resources Officer
Northbridge Capital Partners

label: new_requisition
text:
Executive Assistant to CEO

Hello,

I am looking for an exceptional Executive Assistant to support me and help manage the operational aspects of our growing company. This is much more than a traditional EA role - I need a strategic partner.

Qualifications:

    5+ years supporting C-level executives
    Extremely organized with impeccable attention to detail
    Comfortable with ambiguity and able to prioritize autonomously
    Tech-savvy and quick to learn new tools
    Excellent written and verbal communication
    Discretion and professionalism are non-negotiable

Day-to-day this person will manage my calendar, coordinate travel, prepare materials for meetings, handle correspondence, coordinate with our leadership team, and take on special projects as needed. They need to be proactive, anticipate needs, and solve problems before they become issues.

We are a venture-backed startup in the healthcare technology space, based in Boston. This is an in-office role. Compensation is $85k-$100k plus equity and benefits.

I would like to personally meet final candidates. Please only send profiles of people who have truly excellent references and a track record of supporting executives at high-growth companies.

Best,
Natasha Ivanova
Founder & CEO
HealthBridge Analytics

label: new_requisition
text:
Subject: Need help finding warehouse supervisor - bit stuck!
Hiya,
This is Priya from Cornerstone Beverages in Christchurch. We're a drinks distributor â€“ craft beers, wines, some specialty sodas â€“ and we've got about 140 staff between our warehouse, drivers, and sales team.
Right so we've been trying to hire a Warehouse Supervisor for literally three months now and it's just not happening. We've had two people accept offers and then bail before their start date, and the candidates we're seeing through regular job ads are frankly not suitable. One guy turned up to the interview in jandals which probably tells you something.
We need someone who knows inventory management systems, can supervise a team of about 20 warehouse workers, and understands cold storage compliance because a lot of our product is temperature-sensitive. Forklift license is essential.
I know you folks at Coastal Recruitment have done warehouse placements before â€“ saw your case study on the website. Can you take this on? We're genuinely desperate at this point and willing to pay a premium if you can find us someone decent who'll actually show up.
Let me know soonest!
Cheers,
Priya Sharma
People & Culture Manager
Cornerstone Beverages
priya.sharma@cornerstonebev.co.nz
021 845 7392

label: interview_scheduling
text:
You're invited - Product Designer Interview
Dear Aisha,

We are excited to invite you for an interview for the Product Designer role at Fusion Digital Labs!

**Interview Information:**

When: Friday, December 20, 2024, 10:30 AM
Where: Fusion Digital Labs, Tower B, Level 5, Brigade Gateway Campus, Bangalore - 560001
Duration: 2.5 hours

**Who you'll meet:**
- Round 1 (10:30 AM - 11:30 AM): Portfolio review with Prakash Iyer, Lead Designer
- Round 2 (11:30 AM - 12:30 PM): Design challenge with the product team
- Round 3 (12:30 PM - 1:00 PM): Culture fit conversation with me

**Please bring:**
- Your laptop with design portfolio (Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD)
- Charger (we have power outlets in the meeting rooms)
- Any physical design work or prototypes you'd like to show
- An open mind for the design challenge! ðŸŽ¨

**Design Challenge:**
You'll be given a product problem and asked to sketch/wireframe a solution. Don't worry - we're more interested in your thought process than perfect pixel designs. Sticky notes and markers will be provided.

**Getting Here:**
We're in Tower B of Brigade Gateway. Parking is available in the basement levels B1 and B2. Just tell the security you're visiting Fusion Digital Labs on Level 5. Our reception team will guide you from there.

Lunch will be provided after the interviews, so plan to stay a bit if you can! It's a good chance to meet more of the team informally.

**Dress Code:** Smart casual (we're a pretty relaxed bunch - jeans and a nice top is perfectly fine)

Please confirm you can make it by replying to this email before Wednesday, Dec 18th.

Any questions at all, just reach out. We're really looking forward to seeing your work!

Best,
Keerthi Reddy
Design Recruiter
Fusion Digital Labs
keerthi.reddy@fusionlabs.io
M: +91-99807-66543

I am writing to express my strong interest in the Bank Teller position at First National Bank of America. With a client-focused approach and over three years of experience in financial services, I am confident in my ability to provide exceptional customer service and handling cash transactions.

My skills include proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite, knowledge of banking regulations, and expertise in resolving customer complaints. I have attached my resume for your review.

I would greatly appreciate the opportunity to discuss how my qualifications align with the needs of First National Bank of America. I look forward to an interview at your earliest convenience.

Sincerely,
Emily Chen

Dear Ms. Thompson,

I am writing to express my strong interest in the Receptionist position at NovaTech Corporation. With over three years of experience in providing exceptional customer service, I am confident in my ability to ensure seamless communication and administrative support for your team.

My background includes proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite, calendar management, and event planning. I am passionate about delivering a warm welcome to clients and guests, ensuring they feel valued and respected during their visit.

I have attached my resume for your review. Thank you for considering my application.

Sincerely,
Emily Patel

label: job_application
text:
Dear Ms. Hernandez,

I am writing to express my strong interest in the Phlebotomist position at Precision Healthcare. As an entry-level candidate with a background in medical sciences, I possess excellent communication skills and a proven ability to work effectively under pressure.

My relevant experience includes completing a phlebotomy course and obtaining certification from the National Phlebotomy Association. I am confident that my attention to detail, organizational skills, and proficiency in using medical equipment would make me an asset to your team.

I have attached my resume for your review. Thank you for considering my application and inviting me to discuss this opportunity further.

Sincerely,
Maya Ramos

Dear Mr. Thompson,

I am excited to apply for the Logistician position at GreenTech Inc., as advertised on your website. With over three years of experience in supply chain management and transportation planning, I am confident in my ability to optimize logistics operations.

My background includes proficiency in transportation regulations, warehouse management systems, and inventory control software. I have worked with various stakeholders to improve delivery times and reduce costs by 25%.

I have attached my resume for your review. I would appreciate the opportunity to discuss my qualifications further and explore how my skills can contribute to GreenTech's success.

Sincerely,
Emily Patel

Dear Ms. Thompson,

I am writing to express my strong interest in the Policy Analyst position at GreenTech Solutions. With over three years of experience in policy development and analysis, I am confident in my ability to drive informed decision-making for your organization.

My background includes proficiency in data analysis software such as Excel and Tableau, as well as experience with policy simulation models like GEM. I am also skilled in writing clear and concise policy briefs and reports.

I have attached my resume for your review. Thank you for considering my application and I look forward to discussing my qualifications further.

Sincerely,
Emily Patel

Dear Ms. Thompson,

I am writing to express my strong interest in the Phlebotomist position at NewCare Hospital. With a solid foundation in anatomy and physiology, I have developed expertise in blood collection techniques and patient comfort.

My experience includes successful phlebotomy procedures for patients of all ages and medical conditions, with a focus on minimizing anxiety and stress. I am confident in my ability to maintain accurate records and collaborate effectively with healthcare teams.

I have attached my resume for your review. Thank you for considering my application.

Sincerely,
Maya Jensen

Dear Mr. Thompson,

I am writing to express my strong interest in the Civil Engineer position at GreenTech Solutions. As an analytical individual with a solid foundation in structural analysis and design, I am confident in my ability to contribute to your team.

My experience includes proficiency in CAD software such as AutoCAD and Revit, as well as knowledge of building codes and zoning regulations. I have attached my resume for your review, highlighting my skills in project management and problem-solving.

I would be thrilled to discuss how my expertise can benefit GreenTech Solutions and look forward to the opportunity to meet with you further.

Sincerely,
Ethan Patel

Dear Ms. Thompson,

I am writing to express my strong interest in the Teacher position at Springdale Elementary School. With over three years of experience in lesson planning, classroom management, and student engagement, I am confident in my ability to provide a high-quality education for your students.

My background includes successfully implementing differentiated instruction methods, creating interactive lesson plans, and fostering a positive learning environment. I am well-versed in various educational technologies, including SMART Boards and Google Classroom.

I have attached my resume for your review. I would be thrilled to discuss how my skills and experience align with the needs of Springdale Elementary School.

Sincerely,
Emily Patel

text:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my strong interest in the Sales Representative position at NovaTech Inc. With over three years of experience in account management and team leadership, I am confident in my ability to drive revenue growth for your sales team.

My background includes successfully managing large client relationships, increasing sales conversions by 25% through effective upselling techniques, and developing targeted marketing campaigns that exceed industry benchmarks. I admire NovaTech's innovative approach to product development and would love to bring my creative problem-solving skills to your team.

I have attached my resume for your review. Thank you for considering my application.

Sincerely,
Ethan Kim
